utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Would you like some more coffee, baby-doll?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm fine, thanks.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, see, I can't pull of baby-doll can I?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No. I think we learned that from the sugarlips incident. I'm gonna get some tea.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hiya doin' pumpkin?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nope.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So it looks like it's going really well for you two, huh?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: I know, really well. In fact, I'm gonna ask Phoebe to move in with me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: What do you, what do you think?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think that is so great! When are you gonna ask her?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Tonight, but don't say anything. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I swear, I promise. I promise. Oh my God, I'm so excited! {And I just can't hide it! I'm about to lose control and I think I like it! Sorry, just couldn't resist it.} All right, listen let me tell you, do not get her flowers. Okay? Because y'know, she cries when they die, and there's the whole funeral…

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: I'll see you after work sweetie.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Bye!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So, what movie should we see?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Gary's gonna ask you to move in with him!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?! Really?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He just told me at the counter. He made me promise not to tell, but I couldn't hold it in any longer!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can't believe this!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Right, because it's fast. Because, it's so fast. It's fast!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Relax! It's Phoebe! Not you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh! Good for you Pheebs, way to go!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, but it is fast. Isn't it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohhhh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, I like him a lot but I don't think I'm ready for this!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, what are you gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don't know. I'll just handle it—I'll ask you to talk to him!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Me?! Why me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Because you are so afraid of commitment! You talk to him, make him scared like you! Make him a…man!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'll try, but I'm not sure what good it would do, y'know? Because I'm a lot less afraid of commitment than I used to be.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That is so sweet!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Still terrified, I'll take care of it. No problem.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Ross, is uh, is Staten Island really an island?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh-huh, that's why they call it Staten Island.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ohhh. I thought it was like Long Island.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Also an island.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, what time is it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow! You realize that we've been throwing this ball, without dropping it, for like an hour?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you serious?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. I realized it about a half-hour ago but I didn't want to say anything 'cause I didn't want to jinx it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! We are pretty good at this! Hey! We totally forgot about lunch!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I-I, I think that's the first time I ever missed a meal! Yeah, my pants are a little loose!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, you guys…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Is Monica here?

utterance.speaker: Joey and Ross
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right listen umm, I just bought something I'm not sure she's gonna like it, and it's gonna seem a little crazy, but this is something that I wanted since I was a little girl.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You bought Shawn Cassidy!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Noo! I wish! Okay, you ready?

utterance.speaker: Joey and Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay! Check it out!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What-what is it?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What the hell is that?!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It's a, it's a cat!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That, is not a cat! {I have to agree with Joey on this one.}

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes it is!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why is it inside out?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Excuse me! But this is a purebred, show-quality Sphinx cat!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How much did you pay for that?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, it was a little extravagant, but I a pretty good deal.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah? How much?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: A thousand bucks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: ON A CAT??!!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's not a cat!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right listen ball boys! My grandmother had one of these when I was a little girl and it was the sweetest thing! I mean it was so cute, it would sit in my lap and purr all day long, and I would drag a shoestring on the ground and he would chase it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Free cats do that too, y'know. {Which reminds me, if I might get a little political here, support your local animal shelter. Pet shops are not the place to buy dogs and cats from, you get a much better deal from the shelter, plus they probably won't die on you in a week and a half. If you want a leash, go to the pet shop. If you want the dog for that leash, go to the shelter and save it's life. Now back to regularly scheduled programming.}

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's not a cat!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh! Look you guys, I'm really excited about this! Okay? I don't care what you think! I'm gonna go set up a little litter box for Mrs. Whiskerson. Well, what am I gonna call her? Fluffy?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, you wanna get something to eat or uh, do you wanna see how long we can throw this ball back and forth? Huh?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, the ball thing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Ross, wouldn't it be great if we could go two straight hours without dropping it?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uhh, yeah it would! Let's do it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh-oh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I have to pee. And Rachel's in the bathroom!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Man, I didn't think we were gonna make it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know! Don't switch hands, okay?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey ladies! What are you in here for?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Hey Chandler, what are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Gary, I'm here to report a crime.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It is a crime that you and I don't spend more time together.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: What's up?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I heard that you thinking about asking Phoebe to move in with you and I thought maybe, we should have a talk. Man to uh, me.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Sure. Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, are you crazy? Are you insane? If you live with Phoebe, you two are gonna be y'know, live-living together!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Yeah, I-I considered that. I just know it would make me happy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You mean scared.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: No, I mean happy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Scared? Happy?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Chandler, what-what are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I am trying to open your eyes, my man! Don't you see, if you lived with Phoebe she's always gonna be there. You're gonna get home, she's there. You go to bed, she's there. You wake up and oh yes, she's there!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: I know! I can't wait!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Were you're parents happy, or something?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Listen Chandler, the way I see it is that I was lucky enough to find someone that I really love. I just—I wanna be around her as much as I can.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wow, y'know when you say it, it doesn't sound so scary.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: So you know what I'm talking about, right?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I think I do! Y'know what? You move in with her! You move in with her right now! Maybe I should in with Monica!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: No, it's too soon for you guys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, you're right about that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: …now when they found the remains of the Mesozoic Mastodon they discovered what appeared to be the remains of a Paleozoic Amphibian in its jaws! How did it get there?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Maybe this should be more of a quiet game.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey guys!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey, I left my watch on the counter last night. It was right here, where is it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, come on, I'm-I'm late for work!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How do you know? You don't have a watch.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Guys, could you please just stop throwing the ball for one minute and just help me find it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I don't know…. Yeah, can't do it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Monica, whatever you do, do not drop that ball!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, we haven't dropped it in…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: 2 hours, 27 minutes.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I-I'm not gonna be able to make it into work today, I don't feel very good. Yes!! Wow! Uh, for a second there I thought I was really better, but I'm not.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Rach!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Check it out! Almost 3 hours without droppin' it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, wow! Congratulations, that's quite a waste of time.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rach?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You have scratches all over you, what happened?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, it's my cat.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah, I got a cat.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don't want a cat!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, don't worry, it's not a cat.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You guys this cat is nothing like my grandmother's cat. I mean, it's not sweet, it's not cute, I even dragged that little string on the ground, and it just flipped out and scratched the hell out of me. And I swear, I know this sounds crazy, but every time this cat hisses at me I know it's saying, "Rachel!"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Doesn't sound as crazy as paying a thousand dollars for a cat.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?! You paid a thousand dollars for a cat when you owe me 300!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I was gonna let you play with it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hmm, did you talk to Gary about the moving in thing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes I did, and I think you should do it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He's a great guy, y'know? And he loves you a lot, you are a very lucky lady.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You are useless! Freaking out about commitment is the one thing you can do! The one thing! And you can't even do that right! God!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m sorry. If you ask me, I'd move in with him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh!! God! Ooh! Get out of here, good for nothing.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Hey Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Gar!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Hi sweetie. Hi, can I talk to you for a second?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! Okay.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: You look very pretty today.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thanks! Okay.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Here's the thing.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Y'know I really want to move this relationship forward.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-hmm.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Because if you're not moving forward, y'know you're just moving backwards.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No that's not true. If you're not moving forward, you're just staying still. And staying still is good. Watch this.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: I want you to move in with me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That is so sweet. But don't you think it's a little too soon? I mean there's so much we don't know about each other.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Oh. Oh-oh-okay, I get it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I just—I don't want us to jump into something we're not ready for.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I really don't want to mess up what we have. I'm just—I'm worried it's gonna be a big mistake.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Which is why my answer is yes!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh! I'm so…happy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Monica! Stop throwing it so hard! We're on the same team!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Four hours? You guys have been doing this for four hours?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's right baby.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, let me in.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No-no! Don't do it! Don't!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He's a dropper!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah, that's right!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm not a dropper!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's really a uh-uh three person game, y'know?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's throwing and catching!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh! Oh! That's so hard.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa-whoa you guys, it's not a cat!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my—Oh good God!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I give up you guys, I don't know what I'm going to do with this thing!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Baking it didn't help, huh?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, why don't you just take it back to where you got it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I tried! They won't take her back.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Maybe that's because she's a minion of the anti-Christ.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rach, why won't they take it back?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, they said would but they would only give me store credit. I mean, what am I going to do, get a thousand regular cats?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look, if you want you can keep it at our place until you find out what to do with it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No Mon that's not the point. I'm out a thousand dollars, I'm all scratched up, and I'm stuck with this stupid cat that looks like a hand!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, the cat's made my eyes water! Don't-don't throw it to me! My vision's been compromised!! Oh God! Okay. Okay. It's okay. Man, that was close.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, you almost overreacted to something.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Gary
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: We have great news!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We're moving in together! Isn't it great! Yay!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Congratulations! Congrats!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know, I'm so excited!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: So am I!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, you're not more excited than I am! No way! I'm the most excited!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Okay, I'll see you at the station later.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, yeah, I'll see you later! Don't forget about the moving in!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So you're moving in with him. What happened?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I couldn't tell him no. He got so sad. Maybe it'll be all right. I do really like him a lot and probably do it eventually anyway and plus, think of all the money I'll save on stamps.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why, do you write him a lot?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, I just heard when people live together, they split the cost of stamps. Don't they?

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Yeah! That's right. Yeah-yeah! Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry, the oven mitts really freaked me out.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Hey, honey! Okay, so did you find any apartments? Anything in Brooklyn Heights?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, nothing.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Oh really?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Nothing at all?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, as soon as something opens up we'll move right in. Unless it doesn't have a pool, I need a pool.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Phoebe, can I talk to you for a second?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Take a seat. You okay? You feeling all right?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I feel great. 'Cause we're moving in together.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: So you uh, you checked the paper for listings in Brooklyn Heights, right? You-you checked the Post?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, uh-huh, there was nothing. Can I get some water?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: In a minute. You-you checked today's Post?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, yeah! Today's.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: 'Cause uh, this is today's Post and uh, these are the listings I found. Brooklyn Heights, two bedroom. Brooklyn Heights, one bedroom. Brooklyn Heights, Brooklyn Heights, Brooklyn Heights!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are these for rent! I thought people were just bragging!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Let me tell you what I think might be going on. No-no-no, don't look at the table. Look at me. Okay, I think somebody asked someone to move in with them. And I think someone said, "Yes" but now she's having doubts because things are moving to fast for someone. Does that sound at all possible to you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes. Yes! Fine! I am someone! You want me to say it? I have doubts! I'm sorry!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Phoebe…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Phoebe, it's okay that you feel this way. I mean it is soon. And there's a lot of things we don't know about each other, and I just figure that everything I really like. And the things I don't know, I get to learn about at someplace with both our names on the mailbox.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That's so sweet.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Sweethart, but none of that matters if it's too soon for you. It's fine! We don't have to move in together. I just—I want you to be happy

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Living with you would make me happy.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Phoebe, you don't have to say that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, I really wanna live with you! I wanna move in with you!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Are you sure?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes. Definitely! Yes! Let's live in an apartment that we both live in!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Oh that's great!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh wait, one sec. One sec. Hey you! Behind the glass! Who are you looking at! I've always wanted to say that when I was in one of these rooms, which was never!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Show cat! Quality show cat! Show cat!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It's not a baby! It's a cat!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no! No! It's actually—it's very sweet. It's very sweet. Look! Yeah, do you want it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, so then what are you doing to me? Okay? Just get out of here! All right? Move on!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes! Thank you! Exactly! You want it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, terrific! That'll be $2,000.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, a thousand.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I do, but you're just gonna have to actually look at this as more of an investment than a cat.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Obviously you know how to haggle, so I'm not gonna try and take you on. Okay? So $800 and I don't call the cops because you're robbing me blind! Blind! Just take cat, leave the money, and run away! Run away! Damnit! Cat, can't you at least smile or something?! Okay, did anybody just hear that? Anybody?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm starving!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come on guys! Suck it up! We're closing in on ten hours! It's gut-check time!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know who made you the boss? All right? We invented this game!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Please! I made this game what it is.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Not fun anymore?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm still hungry!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, there's some pizza at my place, we can all eat with one hand right? Are you with me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I am!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right! Let's go! Let's go Team Monica! All right, we can work out the name later.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel! What is your cat doing in one of my bowls!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It's not! I'm defrosting a chicken. Oh, I uh sold Mrs. Whiskerson.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, thank God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Did you get your money back?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, 15 hundred dollars.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! You made a profit!

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: I just came for the red-velvet pillow.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah, there you go.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Thanks Rachel. And-and don't forget you-you can come visit her anytime you want.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh good, great! I'll-I'll keep that in mind.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Hey! So what is this? Some kind of snake or something?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: I really like waking up with you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I like waking up with you too. Oh! It's such a beautiful morning. Oh, I can stay here all day.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: That would be great!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We could have breakfast in bed…

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Wait, just a second.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Oh! Oh no.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right! Come on Monica! Look alive! Come on, look alive!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh good, you're all up.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe! It's 6 o'clock in the morning! Why aren't you at Gary's?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah, that's over.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Come on! Gary's such a great guy! Whatever the problem is, you can work it out!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: He shot a bird!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh that is over!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: That's terrible! I'm sorry!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. Yeah, I'll be alright.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh hey, here Pheebs.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nah, I don't feel like playing.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's okay. It's okay. Just pretend that it didn't happen! Okay? No one needs to know! I mean, Phoebe's not an official ballplayer! I mean, only official ballplayers can drop the ball!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: All right. Okay. I'm starving!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, honey, wanna get some breakfast?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay! Okay, let's race! First one there wins! Ha-ha!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You guys wanna eat here?

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Yeah! As long as we're here!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Man that was great! Huh? Can you believe how long we threw that ball around?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, it is amazing it lasted that long.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know. My arm is killing me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I meant with the dropper over here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know, how did I get this reputation as a dropper? Okay? I'm anything but a dropper.
